channel.title: NMS:IBKR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:IBKR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Interactive Brokers to Join S&P 500 Index, Replacing Walgreens
item.description: Retail trading platform Interactive Brokers Group Inc. will be added to the S&P 500 index later this week, replacing Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. on the closely watched gauge of US stocks.

item.title: Interactive Brokers Climbs on Replacing Walgreens in S&P 500
item.description: (Updates for postmarket share move, adds Talen Energy.)
